item.title: 在连续两个月强劲增长之后，美国 2 月份的就业增长可能有所放缓，但劳动力市场可能仍然过于强劲，美联储可能不会像金融市场目前预期的那样考虑在 6 月份之前降息。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
US job growth likely slowed in February after two straight months of robust gains, but the labor market probably remains too strong for the Federal Reserve to consider cutting interest rates by June as currently anticipated by financial markets. More here: https://t.co/zfV1iVsMMu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 波音公司表示，它正在全面改革员工奖金的发放方式，以强调质量和安全，今年的运营目标将完全集中在这两个方面。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Boeing said it is overhauling how it pays employee bonuses to emphasize quality and safety, with this year's operational goals exclusively focused on these two components. More here: https://t.co/bdUipA3nyP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国 500 指数周四上涨 1%，创收盘纪录新高，纳斯达克综合指数上涨 1.5%，道指涨幅超过十分之三
item.description:
WATCH: The S&P 500 rose 1% to a record closing high on Thursday while the Nasdaq composite finished up 1.5% and the Dow gained more than three-tenths of a percent https://t.co/fa1Dl8DC9a pic.twitter.com/zbXuHItCZt

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚大众汽车公司表示，该公司对电动汽车制造商特斯拉（Tesla）和Polestar退出澳大利亚主要汽车游说组织表示担忧，因为这是对该组织批评拟议的汽车排放规则的抗议。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Volkswagen Australia said it was concerned about the exit of electric vehicle makers Tesla and Polestar from Australia's major automotive lobby in protest over the organization's criticism of proposed vehicle emissions rules. More here: https://t.co/2B3GVt9gex

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 彭博社报道：IMF 格奥尔基耶娃有意连任基金总裁五年
item.description:
IMF's Georgieva interested in second five-year term as fund's head, Bloomberg reports https://t.co/F3BZySP8AV pic.twitter.com/ZdD2PVwRbJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Polestar Australia 周五退出了澳大利亚主要的汽车游说组织，一天前特斯拉也退出了该组织，以抗议该组织对拟议的联邦汽车排放法规的批评。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Electric vehicle maker Polestar Australia quit Australia's major automotive lobby on Friday, a day after Tesla did the same, in protest over the organization's criticism of proposed federal vehicle emissions regulations. More here: https://t.co/yjasDr076K

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在电动汽车需求放缓之际，Rivian 推出了更小、更便宜的 R2 SUV，并表示将在伊利诺伊州的现有工厂开始生产新车型，以确保在 2026 年交付：
item.description:
Rivian unveiled its smaller and less expensive R2 SUV amid a slowdown in demand for EVs, and said it would start producing the new model at its existing facility in Illinois to ensure deliveries in 2026.
Read more: https://t.co/NkidEBJowQ pic.twitter.com/Sk6JyrTmPg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: Stonepeak 为其首个亚洲专项基础设施基金融资 33 亿美元
item.description:
Stonepeak raises $3.3 bln for its first Asia-dedicated infrastructure fund https://t.co/xiVUwYaeRY pic.twitter.com/Fk2ZwEnLvJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: @Breakingviews：随着美国公司面临需求疲软和向更多本土品牌的转移，苹果公司在中国的份额正在被国内竞争对手华为所取代。@sharonlam_ 认为，中国消费者不断变化的态度表明，这种困境可能会恶化。
item.description:
On @Breakingviews: Apple is losing share in China to domestic rival Huawei as American companies face weakened demand and a shift to more home-grown brands. Chinese consumers’ changing attitudes suggest the woes could worsen, argues @sharonlam_ pic.twitter.com/yBoJdf0uXX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 立法者表示，应禁止英国的金融公司滥用保密协议来压制性骚扰和性虐待的受害者，呼吁结束掠夺者和欺凌者逍遥法外的时代。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
Finance firms in Britain should be banned from misusing non-disclosure agreements to silence victims of sexual harassment and abuse, lawmakers said, calling for an end to an era of impunity for predators and bullies. More here: https://t.co/6Bm3pMVRVd

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 轮胎制造商固特异将关闭在马来西亚的生产厂
item.description:
Tire maker Goodyear to close manufacturing plant in Malaysia https://t.co/iARXJITors pic.twitter.com/o68XeXAN6S

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，国际货币基金组织总裁格奥尔基耶娃有意连任基金总裁并获得支持
item.description:
IMF's Georgieva interested in second term as fund's head, has support, say sources https://t.co/NZMXG6ASSE pic.twitter.com/PNcQ4zDpt9

item.title: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）的市场估值超过了特斯拉（Tesla），因为这家广受欢迎的减肥药伟哥维（Wegovy）的制造商宣布了一种备受期待的肥胖症新药的积极早期试验数据：
item.description:
Novo Nordisk surpassed Tesla in market valuation after the maker of the popular weight-loss drug Wegovy announced positive early trial data for a highly anticipated new obesity drug.
More here: https://t.co/W4obnUOBIf pic.twitter.com/vmL6FpzNfZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在经济衰退迫在眉睫之际，德国面临着多方面的罢工，火车司机和机场工人纷纷离职，给数百万旅客造成了混乱，也加剧了该国的经济困境：
item.description:
Germany faced strikes on several fronts as train drivers and airport workers walked off the job, causing chaos for millions of travelers and adding to the country's economic woes at a time of looming recession.
Read more: https://t.co/E7MtfeWWTW pic.twitter.com/WeYIQzR7yH

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行将借贷成本维持在纪录高位，同时谨慎地为今年晚些时候降低借贷成本打下基础，并称其在降低通胀方面取得了良好进展：
item.description:
The European Central Bank kept borrowing costs at record highs while cautiously laying the ground to lower them later this year, saying it had made good progress in bringing down inflation.
More here: https://t.co/nEgSPXdW2k pic.twitter.com/WDNApZkrkY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 观看：由于投资者对美联储今年降息的前景日益乐观，科技股和成长股受到的提振最大。
item.description:
WATCH: Wall Street charged ahead on Thursday as the S&P 500 rose 1% to a record closing high, with the biggest boosts from technology and growth stocks on increasing investor optimism about prospects for Federal Reserve rate cuts this year https://t.co/fa1Dl8DC9a pic.twitter.com/6eJFFqFPro

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行提高首席执行官薪酬，向 P&C 负责人支付 125 万加元以完成汇丰加拿大交易
item.description:
RBC boosts CEO's compensation, pays P&C head C$1.25 million for closing HSBC Canada deal https://t.co/zubMxTKevT pic.twitter.com/Ab6ZEk9VpN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: Rivian 发布了更小、更便宜的 R2 SUV，并表示将在伊利诺伊州的现有工厂开始生产这款对公司成功至关重要的新车型，以确保在 2026 年交付：
item.description:
Rivian unveiled its smaller and less expensive R2 SUV, and said it will start producing the new model, seen as critical to the company’s success, at its existing manufacturing facility in Illinois to ensure deliveries in 2026.
Read more: https://t.co/NkidEBJowQ pic.twitter.com/3bSGk0Q87m

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 尽管看好前景，Vanguard 仍考虑增加信贷风险对冲
item.description:
Vanguard considering more credit exposure hedges despite bullish outlook https://t.co/y9i3EJryKQ pic.twitter.com/k6nAnjWQr6

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: @Breakingviews：在中国，苹果和特斯拉等美国公司面临着需求减弱以及华为和比亚迪等国内竞争对手的青睐。@sharonlam_ 解释说，中国消费者不断变化的口味表明，这种困境可能会恶化。
item.description:
On @Breakingviews: In China, American companies like Apple and Tesla face weakening demand and a preference for domestic rivals like Huawei and BYD. Chinese consumers’ evolving tastes suggest that the woes could worsen, explains @sharonlam_ pic.twitter.com/CaIJLCcQ6f

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024
